Text:
Thanks for the upload rubusdemonoid!

Just wanted to let people know that you can see Martha Wainwrights NAKED breasts in this release.

I found out the secret by accident and without further waiting. here is how to see them.

Get a hold of a media player with frame by frame ability. 
Download the file out of this torrent called The McGarrigle Sisters - A Life In Folk

Skip to the bit where you see Rufus & Martha "naked" having stars over her breasts.

Then you need to go to frame skip and start skipping.

On the last frame before it switches over the stars will be gone for 1 single frame and you can see her naked :) 

Thanks!
